description:
Adversaries may exfiltrate private information via the AI model inference API. AI Models have been shown leak private information about their training data. The model itself may also be extracted for the purposes of AI Intellectual Property Theft.

Exfiltration of information relating to private training data raises privacy concerns. Private training data may include personally identifiable information, or other protected data.
name: Exfiltration via AI Inference API

object_references.description: Exfiltrating data by exploiting AI inference APIs to extract sensitive information.
